intro.headline: the problem
intro.byline: Intuitive websites don't happen by accident.
intro.body: Even today, many websites are found lacking in access­ability, performance, and intuitive organiz­ation. Because of this, customers are lost and visitors fail to reach their dest­ination.

intro.headline: the solution
intro.body: I use unique tools and real metrics to create beautiful, intuit­ive user exp­eriences that out­perform industry standards.

features.headline: features
features.body:
• A flex­ible, performant, multi-page website
  • A resp­onsive design with mobile­-friendly inter­actions
  • Readable, access­ible code with easy content management
